ygData.subject: Re: Macro setup for bards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Bank 1: (used mostly when soloing) B1: Warsong B2: Bellow B3: Healing song B4: Accelerando song B5: Sense Heading B6: Start combat (I also remapped my
ygData.messageBody:
> How does everyone else have their hotkeys setup?
>
> Galtin
> E'ci

Bank 1: (used mostly when soloing)
B1: Warsong
B2: Bellow
B3: Healing song
B4: Accelerando song
B5: Sense Heading
B6: Start combat (I also remapped my attack key from "a" to F6 so I
can't hit it by accident... died too many times with it as "a").

Bank 2: (used mostly in groups)
B1: Anthem
B2: Lullaby
B3: Healing song
B4: Accelerando song
B5: Forage
B6: Start combat

Bank 3: (used mostly when waiting for boats)
B1: Fishing
B2: Sense heading
B3: Forage

Bank 5: (for quick switching of instruments and weapons)
B1: Melee inventory slot 1
B2: Melee inventory slot 2
B3-6: Inventory slots

Bank 6:
B1: Sit
B2: Camp
B5: Spellbook
B6: Walk/run toggle

Tigsen
15th level bard on Innoruuk
